title: Supporting Students with Seizures and Epilepsy (Epilepsy Foundation of America)
text: ( Source : Epilepsy Foundation of America ) Supporting students with seizures in school can be challenging. It takes parents, teachers, school nurses, and the child's healthcare team all working together to make sure a student is both safe and
